scripts.test: npm run e2e-tests && npm run objc-tests && npm run unit-tests
scripts.objc-tests: npm run objc-tests-lib && npm run objc-tests-framework
scripts.objc-tests-lib: xcodebuild test -workspace tests/cordova-ios.xcworkspace -scheme CordovaLibTests -destination "platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 5" CONFIGURATION_BUILD_DIR="`mktemp -d 2>/dev/null || mktemp -d -t 'cordova-ios'`"
scripts.objc-tests-framework: xcodebuild test -workspace tests/cordova-ios.xcworkspace -scheme CordovaFrameworkApp -destination "platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 5" CONFIGURATION_BUILD_DIR="`mktemp -d 2>/dev/null || mktemp -d -t 'cordova-ios'`"
